profile:
DMJ enr. is a young company with its 3 years of service, looking to grow, that specializes in building maintenance. Between the different members of my team and myself, we put our strengths together to offer you a bigger variety of services for all your needs.
Here is a short list of services that we currently offer:
 
·         Painting (interior | exterior | line marking - ground)
·         Plaster
·         Silicone
·         Preventive lighting
·         Landscaping
·         Unblock drains, toilets, sinks
·         Furniture adjustment
·         Replacement of HVAC filters | belt adjustment
·         Other work on request
 
Jobs can be done through an annual contract or on request depending on the work that needs to be completed.
We are here to assist building owners in the repairs and upkeep needed for their real estate investments. We currently work with building owners like Energie Cardio, Reintegration centers and real estates. We also developed some partnerships with suppliers that will make you save some costs on material that you will be needing for those jobs.
For more information, please contact us :
                
                By phone at 514-952-7133 (Mathieu)  |
 
Looking forward to working with you,
________________________________________________________
                       DMJ enr.
Mathieu McLean (Owner)| Mylène Coupal (Assitant)
